Webhooks in the ECA Engine
Webhooks are URL's to which other services on the Web will post event data, and therefore enable the real-time reactive Web. A Webhook consists of:
  • Event Name: The name that identifies the event for the user.
  • Public/Private flag: Whether other users of the system will also be able to receive those events.
  • URL: The URL over which remote services will push events into this system.(will be provided to you by the system)
